original_title: The Wrestler: A Q.T. Marshall Story
overview: Q.T. Marshall has been independently wrestling for nearly a decade. Turning 30, and sustaining multiple injuries in the ring, his career could quite possibly, be coming to an end. Q.T. has one last shot in making it into the WWE - if he fails, he will be forced to hang up his wrestling boots forever.
title: The Wrestler: A Q.T. Marshall Story
